description: This data comes from a survey conducted by the New Orleans Crime Coalition's Citizen Satisfaction Survey. The survey sample includes 600 New Orleans residents, 75 from each police distract. The data has a margin of error of plus or minus 4% and has a 95% confidence interval. The results of the survey represent citizen perceptions and opinions, not objective measures of performance or safety.

name: Citizens Reporting Confidence in NOPD and Feeling Safe in their Neighborhood (2009 - Present)
